sentences.sContent: Whatever you do, don't let the stress derange owe head.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whatever you do, don't let the stress derange owe head.
sentences.sCn: 但无乱咋样，无所不能让压力使得你精神错乱。

sentences.sContent: To disturb the normal physical or mental health of; derange .
sentences.sContent_eng: To disturb the normal physical or mental health of; derange .
sentences.sCn: 使生病，使失调，使错乱打乱正常的身体或智能的健康；使神经错乱。

words.tran: 使（精神）错乱（derange的过去分词和过去式）；扰乱

remMethod.val: 精神错乱 (derange)， 没法安排 (arrange)

trans.tranOther: to disturb the order or arrangement of; throw into disorder; disarrange
